import React from 'react' import { removeProductFromCart , addProductToCart } from '../features/cartSlice' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Cart = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const products = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const itemTotal = (p,q) => { return p.tos*q } console.log(products) if(!products) return 'Loading...' return (
{products.length === 0 ?

Your cart is empty


Click here to Shop
: null } { products.map((product )=> (
{product.productName}

{product.productVersion}

{product.qty}
{`${product.productPrice}/- Rs`}
//

dispatch(removeProductFromCart(product.id))}>{product.productName}

//
))}

Total

{products.map((product) => (

{product.productName}

{`${product.productPrice} X ${product.qty}`}
{itemTotal(product.productPrice, product.qty)}
))}
) } export default Cart
